Articles.Content:
BZ-1 Radial Attachment Point allows you to easily radially attach things.

No more clipping cubic struts to get more light attachment nodes.

![QvT4Tai.png](http://i.imgur.com/QvT4Tai.png)

![kXwuooel.png](http://i.imgur.com/kXwuooel.png)

[Download on SpaceDock...](http://spacedock.info/mod/338/BZ-1%20Radial%20Attachment%20Point)

...or just use <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr>. 

In career mode the part is unlocked with the Advanced MetalWorks node.

Licensed (or whatever you are supposed to call it with CC0) under CC0.
